game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the lost artifact
game.description: The lost artifact of Flarris has been missing for years. Rumors have it that it's hidden in the dark caves of Morristowne. It's your task to find it and return it to its rightful place.

tasks.description: Travel to Morristowne, it is located to the east of our Kingdom.
Find the entrance to the dark caves, you may need to interact with the locals to find it.
Explore the caves and find the lost artifact. Be careful, the caves are said to be dangerous.
Once retrieved, return the artifact to me.
